description: Get ready to call "UNO" on your Palm Pre!  Play the classic card game that's #1 for fun with friends and family. Playing UNO™ has never been so fun and easy, thanks to a brand new gameplay system! Simply drag & drop cards using your finger on the screen for intuitive control, and be the first to get rid of all your cards.   - The #1 card game for friends and family fun recreated with the game’s classic identity and rules that are easy enough for anyone to understand!  - Enjoy unique multiplayer modes! Play with your friends through a local Wi-Fi connection, or go online to play 24/7 with people from all over the world (through 3G or Wi-Fi connection) - Allows for customizing the game rules and discovering new ways to play UNO™ like “UNO 7-0”, “UNO Challenge”, “Jump In” and many others.  - Progress through increasingly difficult challenges in Tournament Mode to collect prizes and unlock colorful deck themes to give the game a fresher look. - All your favorite Action Cards are here: Wild, Reverse, Draw 2 and more!   Ideal for fans of board and card games.  Follow the official Twitter account to get more info about the game: http://twitter.com/UNO_Gameloft
